name: Tsukumogami (itch)
description:
Tsukumogami 
possess objects and make your way through feudal Japan.

Tsukumogami is a game about a cute Yokai that has to progress through the levels by taking over different objects.
Each possession comes with an exciting set of different mechanics that can be used in different ways to progress the levels.

  • Explore different mechanics
  • Defeat unique enemies
  • Enjoy a unique art style
Tsukumogami was developed in only 4 days as part of Brackey's Game Jam. Credits

Alexandre Santos - Game Design  / Art / Sound Design

Benjamin Gomes - Game Programming 

Gabriel Rachman - Game Design
